title: Privacy Policy
intro: This policy explains how Rignum handles information when you use the Service.
Rignum is designed to minimize data collection and to display metadata and external links only.

sections.heading: Data we may collect
bullets: Basic usage data for security and reliability (e.g., timestamps, pages requested).
Information you submit in reports/legal notices (e.g., email, message, URLs).

sections.heading: What we do not intentionally collect
bullets: We do not ask for financial account details.
We do not provide brokerage, trading, or payment features.
We do not intend to store third-party post/article text on our pages.

sections.heading: Retention
paragraphs: Indexed entries may be stored temporarily (e.g., up to ~24 hours) and then removed as part of normal operations.
Reports and legal notices may be retained longer for compliance and recordkeeping.

sections.heading: Sharing
paragraphs: We do not sell personal information.
We may share information only when necessary to comply with law or to protect rights, safety, and security.

footer: External sources • Content not hosted • Unverified • Minimal data collection
